title: [貿易戰新聞] 特朗普：冇興趣同中國達成短暫、不完全既協議

replies.msg:
早前有報導指中共提出就商品貿易同美國達成短暫協議，將知識產權、網絡安全等問題押後再議。白宮早前就此意見分歧，而特朗普亦曾指唔排除呢個可能。

但今日答案出爐：冇興趣，一定要係全份貿易協議咁黎，唔擔心選民懲罰佢。

President Donald Trump said he doesn’t want to make a partial trade deal with China and that voters won’t punish him for the ongoing trade war in his 2020 bid for re-election.

“I am not looking for a partial deal. I am looking for a complete deal,” Trump said Friday at the White House during a joint news conference with Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison.

全文報導：Bloomberg
https://www.bloomberg.com/amp/news/articles/2019-09-20/trump-dismisses-partial-deal-with-china-to-end-trade-war?__twitter_impression=true
